definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: At room temperature all the metals are paramagnetic.
sentences.chinese: 在室溫時，所有的金屬都是順磁性的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the new technique on extracting anterior segment nonmagnetic foreign bodies.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼前段非磁性異物摘出的方法。

sentences.english: The technology of magnetic fluid viscosity drag reduction is a new one.
sentences.chinese: 磁性液體粘性減阻技術是一種新興的技術。

sentences.english: The fibers have obviously effect of magnetizing in several minute.
sentences.chinese: 磁性纖維用很短時間的充磁就可以獲得較理想的效果。

sentences.english: Some explanations and discussions about the differentiation of the "soil magnetic profile" were given.
sentences.chinese: 對“土壤磁性剖面”的分異作了若干解釋和討論。

sentences.english: Normalizing treatment and product thickness affect magnetic property little in this experiment.
sentences.chinese: 試驗中，常化和產品厚度對產品磁性能的影響不明顯。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties were determined by vibrating sample magnetometer.
sentences.chinese: 用振動樣品磁強計進行磁性測量。

sentences.english: The iron was magnetized by passing electricity through wire wound round it.
sentences.chinese: 這塊鐵因繞在上面的線圈通了電而有磁性。

sentences.english: She told me I had fallen down an elevator shaft .
sentences.chinese: 磁性系統內部的電梯井的牆壁，沒有正常的電氣控制。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties and the domain refining effect of laser grooving are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究取向硅鋼板磁性及激光刻痕細化磁疇的效果。

sentences.english: The magnetic system is inside the walls of the elevator shaft , there are no normal electrical controls.
sentences.chinese: 磁性系統內部的電梯井的牆壁，沒有正常的電氣控制。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties of the coating were measured by vibrating sample magnetometer(VSM).
sentences.chinese: 採用振動樣品磁強計測試了鍍層的磁性能。

sentences.english: Kerosene-based and diester-based magnetic fluids were prepared using the synthesized nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 利用合成的納米磁粉製備了煤油基和二酯基磁性液體。

sentences.english: The magnet is usually made in the shape of horseshoe so that it will be as strong as possible.
sentences.chinese: 磁鐵通常是做成馬蹄形的，以便使其磁性儘可能地強。

sentences.english: With increasing temperature, the samples undergo a transition from ferrimagnetism to paramagnetism.
sentences.chinese: 隨溫度升高，樣品由亞鐵磁性逐漸過渡到順磁性。

sentences.english: With increasing temperature, the samples undergo a transition from ferrimagnetism to paramagnetism.
sentences.chinese: 隨溫度升高，樣品由亞鐵磁性逐漸過渡到順磁性。

definition: simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
